thread.title: 5 Cleveland beverage startups to watch in 2017: Cocktail mixers, coffee and more
thread.title_full: 5 Cleveland beverage startups to watch in 2017: Cocktail mixers, coffee and more

author: Nikki Delamotte, cleveland.com
title: 5 Cleveland beverage startups to watch in 2017: Cocktail mixers, coffee and more
text: Why stop at "eat local" when you can also "drink local"? Along with Cleveland's craft food boom, plenty of small businesses are emerging to help fill up your cup. We asked a few emerging businesses about the challenges and rewards of launching a beverage operation in Cleveland.
